com.orsoncharts.renderer.ColorScale

    Package Description
    com.orsoncharts.legend
    Classes related to chart legends.
    com.orsoncharts.renderer
    Base package for renderer support.
    com.orsoncharts.renderer.xyz
    Renderers that can be used with the XYZPlot class.

    • Uses of ColorScale in com.orsoncharts.renderer

      Classes in com.orsoncharts.renderer that implement ColorScale 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FixedColorScale
      A ColorScale that returns the same color for every value on the scale.
      class  GradientColorScale
      A color scale that runs a linear gradient between two colors.
      class  RainbowScale
      A color scale that returns all the colors of the rainbow.
